game.name: Corner Streamer
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 텍스트 크기 조절, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Corner Streamer is a chill idle game where your avatar streams from the corner, earning views, donations, and sponsors. Customize your look, upgrade your setup, and climb to the top of the streaming world.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Corner Streamer is a chill idle game where your avatar streams from the corner, earning views, donations, and sponsors. Customize your look, upgrade your setup, and climb to the top of the streaming world.
